data.title: Moderna's Vaccine Program News Overshadows Its Earnings Report
data.text: The financials were a sideshow as investors focused on the company's potential vaccines for the COVID-19 coronavirus and congenital cytomegalovirus.

data.title: Moderna, Inc. (MRNA) CEO Stéphane Bancel on Q4 2019 Results - Earnings Call Transcript

data.title: 4 Healthcare Stocks to Gain as Coronavirus Threat Looms Large
data.text: Healthcare companies are trying to find a cure and contain the coronavirus outbreak. This keeps the industry in focus

data.title: Moderna (MRNA) Beats Earnings Estimates in Q4, Revenues Miss
data.text: Moderna (MRNA) reports narrower-than expected loss in the fourth quarter. However, revenues miss estimates.

data.title: Moderna's stock climbs as coronavirus vaccine shipment offsets earnings miss
data.text: Shares of Moderna Inc. MRNA, +27.81% were up 14% in premarket trading on Wednesday - the day after the biotechnology company said it had shipped the first COVID-19 vaccine candidate to the National Institutes of Health for clinical trials.
